item.title: Installation
item.description: In contrast to plugins, TAS-Battle requires a “clientside” mod to enable slow motion in Minecraft. For that reason you need to install this mod yourself. Installing in the vanilla launcher Head over to https://fabricmc.net/use/installer/ Click “Download for Windows”. Open the downloaded file. Select “1.19.4” as the Minecraft version. The loader version should be always kept at the newest Next we need to download the required mods: TAS-Battle: https://data.mgnet.work/tasbattle/client.jar Put them into .
